CustomField.description: User captures the outcome of their Calls with Life Support Customers during incidents for power outage.
CustomField.label: Call Outcome

value.fullName: Spoke to customer - backup plan enacted, customer currently safe
value.label: Spoke to customer - backup plan enacted, customer currently safe

value.fullName: Spoke to customer - sent to DEECA
value.label: Spoke to customer - sent to DEECA

value.fullName: Spoke to customer - life support no longer required
value.label: Spoke to customer - life support no longer required

value.fullName: Multiple calls no answer - welfare check required, sent to DEECA
value.label: Multiple calls no answer - welfare check required, sent to DEECA

value.fullName: Incorrect number - welfare check required, no contact details
value.label: Incorrect number - welfare check required, no contact details
